Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: We came 3 days out of 6 and the food was amazing, the man does anything he can to help and make your experience wonderful. I highly recommend it! The steak was beautiful and is reasonably priced

Review Text: Well, it's pizza. Here, you're paying for friendly staff and the location. The food is alright. It seems mainly fresh but not high quality. My friend had the seafood pasta, it was alright. I had a vegetarian pizza. They were friendly enough …

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: The margarita was similar to pizza I had in Sweden, so not a typical Italian pizza but better because the cheese has more flavour than mozzarella.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Great pizza, alright pasta. The portion sizes are very big, you may want to share. The prices are reasonable and the tiramisu was very good. The owner may come across unfriendly, but it's a language barrier. He is actually a nice man. Group of 5 and we all enjoyed our meal. Nothing super special, but good food.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Great Food, Coming back here for more of this Delicious Taste.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: The place isn't the freshest and newest spot around but the prices are appropriate. The waiter was friendly and calm, the food was tasty and the portion was a perfect amount. This is not an Italian place and they can't compete with real …

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Well. This place is filthy. The floors, the chairs, the ceiling are all like they haven't been renovated for decades. The food was not that great but not that bad either. The atmosphere was awful. The personnel was decent although there were no other people to serve. Keep away as there are better solutions near the restaurant.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Pizza was great and ricotta cheese and spinach was really good! Staff was friendly and the atmosphere was nice too. Prices are decent for Amsterdam. I read the bad reviews, most of those people don't know how things work in the Netherlands.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Would not recommend this place at all. The owner was very rude to us, we had only just finished our meals and were waiting to order desert and more drinks when he shoved the bill in our face, he made us pay and kicked us out well before we were finished. Do not go here if you like to take your time and enjoy your meal

Name: Bella Regina

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: You can't go wrong with an Italians can you. Well you can at this place., worst food I have ever had. Steak was tasteless, wifes Pasta was full of water and our friends Callenoni was microwaved to death. Avoid at all costs. Spoilt an otherwise excellent weekend in Amsterdam.

Name: Bella Regina
Review Text: Vandaag lekker uiteten geweest bij Bella Regina in Amsterdam Centrum met m’n lieve vriendinnetjes. Het eten was echt heerlijk! We hebben genoten van onze spaghetti en pasta’s, maar er was nog veel meer keus. Het personeel is heel vriendelijk en ik ga daar zeker weer een keertje eten als ik in Amsterdam ben. Zeker een aanrader!
